biotools.summary:
A significant discriminative sequence motif discovery algorithm with multiple testing correction.

sudo apt-get install libgmp3-dev.

Or see this URL. Notice that the build option "--enable-cxx" is necessary for configuration like this:.

Execute MotiMul without distinguishing a sequence and its complementary strand if you use it for DNA sequences. -v.
